::Skullgrin/Triggerhappy::

       Skullgrin gets up, and makes a nasty gri=
n.

        "Ha, ready for action!!  Those who stand against me shall soon =
fall before me!" He said, ready to scrap some Autobots, er, Maximals, er, w=
hoever they were going to attack.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~
       Triggerhappy arrives at the Dark Avian just in time to hear the n=
ews of the assault.  He landed, transformed to robot mode, then went into t=
he control room where he saw Skullgrin and Switchblade, as well as Scourge =
and Cyclonus.

       "Mind if I join the party?" He asked evilly.
~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
         Skullgrin grinned(lol).

     =
    "The more the merrier!" He said, greeting Triggerhappy.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
         Triggerhappy put Blowpipe in his hand=
(Blowpipe is in gun mode).  

          "Me and you are going to cause some=
 major damage," Triggerhappy said, half to himself and half to Blowpipe.
  =
